name: Keep the ISS alive
description:
All values are due to change, but at the moment:

ISS will crash if the Propulsion gets to 0.

Science is generated  EACH second:

- 1 point x each Science Antenna

- 1 point x each Science Module Color (A B or C)

- 2 Extra points for each Set of 1 A 1 B and 1 C

You need to supply electricty to do science, you gather 2 Points of Electricty for each Solar Panel, you use each second:

1 x each Space Module as Heat

2x each Science Antenna or Science Module
